name: cerb.projectBoard.action.task.close
description: Close task cards when they enter this project board column
script:
start:
  decision:
    outcome/task:
      if@bool:
        {{card__context is record type ('task')}}
      then:
        record.update:
          output: record_task
          inputs:
            record_type: task
            record_id: {{card_id}}
            fields:
              status: closed
        return:
